categories: Category:Sith Lords of the reconstituted Sith Empire

nodes.text: Balionn-Gur was a male Sith Lord of the Sith Empire during the Cold War with the Galactic Republic. Balionn-Gur conquered a planet and, out of a desire to rule through law and order rather than fear, hired diplomats to reassure the populace of his intentions, allowing him to establish order without violence.
